desc: Buy bronze metal sculptures, statues, & figurines! Classical, abstract, nude sculptures, erotic sculptures, western sculptures & more! Featured sculptors: Rodin, Moreau, Chiparus, Giacometti, Remington, Barye, Moore, Russell, Milo, Vitaleh, Dalou, Patoue, Preiss, Lorenzl, Gory, Botero and more!

layout.text: Featuring artists like Dali, Giacometti, Picasso, & Moore
